title: "Space Launch Daily"
content:
**Welcome to Space Launch Daily!**

Our website is your go-to source for the latest news and updates on space launches from around the world. We cover everything from government-sponsored missions to private space companies pushing the boundaries of space exploration.

Stay up-to-date with our daily coverage of rocket launches, satellite deployments, and other exciting events happening in space. Our team of expert writers and reporters bring you detailed analysis and commentary on each mission, along with stunning visuals that capture the beauty and wonder of space.

Join our community of space enthusiasts and never miss a launch again. Whether you're a seasoned space nerd or just getting started, we have something for everyone here at Space Launch Daily.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An image of a rocket launching into space with a trail of fire behind it, set against a starry sky."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
